entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Algonquin Park (Brent)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:04 p.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 20 this afternoon. High 17. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
